groovyx.net.http

Interface HttpConfig.Auth

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpConfigs.BasicAuth, HttpConfigs.ThreadSafeAuth
    Enclosing interface:
    HttpConfig

    public static interface HttpConfig.Auth

    Defines the configurable HTTP request authentication properties.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void basic(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Configures the request to use BASIC authentication with the given username and password.
      void basic(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password, boolean preemptive)
      Configures the request to use BASIC authentication with the given username and password.
      default void digest(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Configures the request to use DIGEST authentication with the given username and password.
      void digest(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password, boolean preemptive)
      Configures the request to use DIGEST authentication with the given information.
      HttpConfig.AuthType getAuthType()
      Retrieve the authentication type for the request.
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Retrieves the configured password for the request.
      java.lang.String getUser()
      Retrieves the configured user for the request.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthType

        HttpConfig.AuthType getAuthType()

        Retrieve the authentication type for the request.

        Returns:
        the HttpConfig.AuthType for the Request

      • getUser

        java.lang.String getUser()

        Retrieves the configured user for the request.

        Returns:
        the configured user

      • getPassword

        java.lang.String getPassword()

        Retrieves the configured password for the request.

        Returns:
        the configured password for the request

      • basic

        default void basic(java.lang.String user,
                   java.lang.String password)

        Configures the request to use BASIC authentication with the given username and password. The authentication will not be preemptive. This method is an alias for calling: basic(String, String, false).

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
     request.auth.basic 'admin', '$3cr3t'
}
        Parameters:
        user - the username
        password - the user’s password

      • basic

        void basic(java.lang.String user,
           java.lang.String password,
           boolean preemptive)

        Configures the request to use BASIC authentication with the given username and password.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
     request.auth.basic 'admin', '$3cr3t', true
}
        Parameters:
        user - the username
        password - the user’s password
        preemptive - whether or not this call will override similar configuration in the chain

      • digest

        default void digest(java.lang.String user,
                    java.lang.String password)

        Configures the request to use DIGEST authentication with the given username and password. The authentication will not be preemptive. This method is an alias for calling: digest(String, String, false).

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
     request.auth.digest 'admin', '$3cr3t'
}
        Parameters:
        user - the username
        password - the user’s password

      • digest

        void digest(java.lang.String user,
            java.lang.String password,
            boolean preemptive)

        Configures the request to use DIGEST authentication with the given information.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
     request.auth.digest 'admin', '$3cr3t', true
}
        Parameters:
        user - the username
        password - the user’s password
        preemptive - whether or not this call will override similar configuration in the chain
